Moving 5.3/6.0 Folders

When you move a 5.3/6.0 folder, Serena ChangeMan Version Manager moves the folder and all of its versioned files to the destination location. You can move a folder within any 5.3/6.0 project root.

When you move a folder, the archives do not move; the versioned files reference the archives in their original location.

To move a folder:

  1. In the Project pane, select the folder you want to move.

  2. Select Edit | Move. The Project Browse dialog box appears.

  3. Select a 5.3/6.0 project and click OK.

    Note: Depending on how you've set up your Version Manager environment, a dialog box may ask for confirmation to move the folder. Click Yes to confirm the move or No to cancel.
